system.description:
Prerequisites

Spellschool (Any) 4 Ranks, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.CEdyF0fS2BRXlARl]{Practiced Stylus}

Benefits

When attacking with a stylus, a mage can choose to gain +1 damage dice per character level. If they do, the range increment of their stylus is halved.

Special

The features of this feat may not be combined with the Ranged Stylus Feat.
system.summary: Halve range for double damage die
